TextEng: I am seeking some artifacts.
None of your business.
No, I think I will just be going.
A dragon's tooth.
The only way I would trust you is if you were dead.
Text: 널 신뢰할 유일한 방법은 네가 죽는 것뿐이야.

TextEng: State your offer.
Ones that were stolen from my school.
I guess I had better go then.
You are lying, at least about some of it.
So you didn't recover any of them?
I know you have the tooth.
Text: 네가 이빨을 가지고 있다는 걸 알아.

TextEng: You can call me <Master/Mistress> of Shadows.
I am one who has come to end your evil!
Even your own followers say you are evil.
You stole Master Drogan's artifacts.
Tymofarrar told me what you are like.
You surround yourself with evil creatures.
Text: 넌 악한 생명체들로 자신을 둘러싸고 있어.

TextEng: You are evil and I must smite you.
I have no idea what you mean.
I suppose it is possible.
I was simply exploring. I enjoy a challenge.
So you already have the dragon's tooth?
Text: 그럼 이미 용의 이빨을 가지고 있다는 거야?

TextEng: What is in it for me, if I find this tower?
Text: 이 탑을 찾으면 내게 무엇이 돌아와?

TextEng: No, I think I will be leaving now.
I thought there were four artifacts.
Where would I find these artifacts?
Text: 이 유물들을 어디서 찾을 수 있어?

TextEng: He is not the one who has the tower.
I spoke to Tymofarrar and he thought you had the tower.
Text: 티모파라르와 이야기했는데 네가 탑을 가졌다고 생각하더군.

TextEng: I found one of his servants, Deekin. He has hidden the tower.
Text: 그의 하인 중 하나인 디킨을 찾았어. 그가 탑을 숨겼어.

TextEng: He has hidden the tower and wants to be free of Tymofarrar.
Text: 그가 탑을 숨겼고 티모파라르로부터 자유롭기를 원해.

TextEng: No, Deekin has hidden the tower.
He's a stupid kobold and he broke the tower.
He is a kobold and he never returned the tower to Tymofarrar because he wants to be free.
Text: 그는 코볼트고 자유를 원해서 티모파라르에게 탑을 돌려주지 않았어.

TextEng: A creature of great evil; the perfect quest!
I cannot face a dragon!
How would you suggest I defeat him?
And you expect me to face that?
Yes, I get it. Only use it near the dragon; now get on with it.
Text: 알았어, 알았어. 용 근처에서만 사용하라고. 이제 계속해.

TextEng: How does it work?
What is it?
I don't think I want to fight him.
Text: 그와 싸우고 싶지 않은 것 같아.

TextEng: I think I had better kill you instead.
What do I get out of this?
Text: 이걸 통해 내가 얻는 건 뭐야?

TextEng: I will do it.
I will be going now.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> How about some gold up front?
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 선불로 금화를 좀 받는 건 어때?

TextEng: I want to ask you some questions.
That is all my questions.
You are quite attractive. How about we spend a little private time together?
Text: 상당히 매력적이야. 둘만의 시간을 좀 보내는 게 어때?

TextEng: What would you say if I told you Tymofarrar sent me to kill you?
Text: 티모파라르가 널 죽이라고 나를 보냈다고 말하면 뭐라고 할 거야?

TextEng: Now that I have something to help me defeat both of you, I think I will do just that.
Text: 이제 둘 다 물리치는 데 도움이 될 무언가가 있으니, 그렇게 할게.

TextEng: I think I will kill you after all.
I will kill Tymofarrar for you.
What do you need the tower for?
What are you? You do not seem to be truly elven.
Text: 넌 뭐야? 진정한 엘프는 아닌 것 같은데.

TextEng: Why don't you use it then?
I come, bringing you a message from Tymofarrar.
<StartCheck>[Persuade - lie]</Start> He would like to arrange a truce.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득 - 거짓말]</Start> 그가 휴전을 제안하고 싶어 해.

TextEng: He would like to see you chained to a stake, ready for supper. His supper.
Text: 그는 네가 말뚝에 묶인 채 만찬 준비가 되기를 원해. 그의 만찬이야.

TextEng: He wants the artifacts you stole from him.
He wants you dead.
If you give me your artifact I will let you live.
Perhaps I should just kill you both!
Text: 둘 다 죽여버려야 할 것 같아!

TextEng: What do you offer?
I will honor my deal with Tymofarrar.
I haven't decided if we are friends or enemies, yet.
Text: 우리가 친구인지 적인지 아직 결정하지 못했어.

TextEng: Why should I tell you my name?
I am <FirstName>, a mercenary seeking employment.
My name is <FirstName>, J'nah. I'm interested in being friends.
Text: 내 이름은 <FirstName>야, 즈나. 친구가 되는 데 관심이 있어.

TextEng: It was too easy to reach you here. You need my protection.
Text: 여기서 너한테 도달하기 너무 쉬웠어. 내 보호가 필요하겠어.

TextEng: Then I suppose I will have to kill you.
What could I do to prove myself?
Text: 내 자신을 증명하려면 무엇을 해야 해?

TextEng: I am here to kill you.
I believe you are looking for something.
I might be able to help you deal with your traitor.
Text: 네 배신자를 처리하는 걸 도울 수 있을지도 몰라.

TextEng: You need an alliance against a common enemy.
Text: 공동의 적에 대한 동맹이 필요할 거야.

TextEng: I speak of the old dwarf, Drogan.
Now that introductions are in order, why don't we get down to business?
Text: 이제 소개가 끝났으니, 본론으로 들어가는 게 어때?

TextEng: That information won't save your life.
Text: 그 정보로는 목숨을 구할 수 없을 거야.

TextEng: I don't have to be an enemy.
I guess I'll be going now.
I will not work with you. I will destroy you!
Text: 너랑 함께 일하지 않을 거야. 널 파괴하겠어!

TextEng: Do you speak of Tymofarrar?
Tell me of this enemy.
I spoke of the harpers.
<StartHighlight>[Insight]</Start> You are not fully elven, are you?
<StartCheck>[Persuade - lie]</Start> I am hunting members of the Harpers and they are hunting you.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득 - 거짓말]</Start> 하퍼 단원들을 추적 중인데 그들도 널 추적하고 있어.

TextEng: There are two harpers nearby; Drogan and a ranger known as Ayala.
Text: 근처에 하퍼가 둘 있어. 드로건과 아얄라라는 순찰자지.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade - lie]</Start>We are both being hunted by a harper named Ayala.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득 - 거짓말]</Start> 둘 다 아얄라라는 하퍼에게 추적당하고 있어.

TextEng: I spoke of your gnoll chieftain.
I think there are other things that interest you.
Text: 네 관심을 끄는 다른 것들이 있다고 생각해.

TextEng: Your death shall be impressive!
I was thinking of Tymofarrar.
One of his servants is hiding from him and I want to help.
Text: 그의 하인 중 하나가 그에게서 숨고 있고 내가 돕고 싶어.

TextEng: I met him, but I was unimpressed.
He betrayed you and I would like to help you get your revenge.
Text: 그가 널 배신했고 복수를 돕고 싶어.

TextEng: I come as his messenger.
I want to kill him.
Maybe not.
If I had some help, I might.
I do not fear him.
That is my plan.
First, tell me who you are.
No thanks.
I guess I'll hear what you have to say.
I am very interested.
That is disgusting! Don't expect me to help.
That sounds quite pleasurable.
Not yet.
The dragon is dead.
Tymofarrar did not have it.
The tower was never returned.
A kobold named Deekin hid it.
One of his servants kept it.
Not yet.
I hoped maybe you had found him.
I cannot find Deekin.
No, goodbye.
I think I will kill you instead.
No, I want my reward now.
I demand my reward, right now!
Fine, tell me.
Yes, please tell me.
You shall never succeed, for I will destroy you!
Text: 결코 성공하지 못할 거야, 내가 널 파괴할 테니까!

TextEng: What allies have you gained?
You are demons?
Which is where I come in?
That is disgusting! Don't expect me to help.
That sounds quite pleasurable.
I have decided I must kill you.
